actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1902 (a)(14)(B) (i) of the Social Security Act to make optional certain cost-sharing fees now required to be paid by some individuals under medicaid.

summary.text: Makes optional, under the Social Security Act, enrollment fees, premiums, or similar charges now required to be paid by some individuals under medicaid.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1902 (a)(14)(B) (i) of the Social Security Act to make optional certain cost-sharing fees now required to be paid by some individuals under medicaid.
